plot: David Parry, a humble grocer wins a radio song-writing contest, but gets well out of his depth when he is introduced to the high-life of London.
title: Sing Along with Me
plot_es: David Parry, a humble grocer wins a radio song-writing contest, but gets well out of his depth when he is introduced to the high-life of London.
plot_en: David Parry, a humble grocer wins a radio song-writing contest, but gets well out of his depth when he is introduced to the high-life of London.
